title: nhl
text:
Nashville 3, New Jersey 1 
Winnipeg 4, N.Y. Rangers 1 
Montreal 3, Pittsburgh 2 
San Jose 5, Washington 0 
Florida 4, Carolina 1 
Detroit 3, Tampa Bay 1 
Dallas 4, Edmonton 2 
St. Louis at Calgary, late 
Vancouver at Los Angeles, late 
Today’s Games 
Ottawa at Columbus, 7 p.m. 
Chicago at Philadelphia, 8 p.m. 
Boston at Colorado, 10 p.m. 
Arizona at Anaheim, 10:30 p.m. 
Thursday’s Games 
Nashville at N.Y. Islanders, 7 p.m. 
Ottawa at Pittsburgh, 7 p.m. 
Chicago at Washington, 7 p.m. 
N.Y. Rangers at Montreal, 7:30 p.m. 
Dallas at Tampa Bay, 7:30 p.m. 
Buffalo at Florida, 7:30 p.m. 
St. Louis at Edmonton, 9 p.m. 
Minnesota at Arizona, 10 p.m. 
CANADIENS 3, PENGUINS 2 
Montreal111—3 
Pittsburgh020—2 
First Period—1, Montreal, Pacioretty 3 (Gallagher, Markov), 5:46. Penalties—Plotnikov, Pit (interference), 9:59; Desharnais, Mon (interference), 10:44. 
Second Period—2, Pittsburgh, B.Bennett 1, 5:31. 3, Montreal, Pacioretty 4 (Petry, Beaulieu), 8:45 (pp). 4, Pittsburgh, Letang 1 (Kessel, Malkin), 10:09. Penalties—Pittsburgh bench, served by Sprong (too many men), 7:46. 
Third Period—5, Montreal, Fleischmann 1 (Desharnais, Weise), 5:20. Penalties—Smith-Pelly, Mon (tripping), 7:41. 
Shots on Goal—Montreal 7-12-11—30. Pittsburgh 4-15-14—33. 
Power-play opportunities—Montreal 1 of 2; Pittsburgh 0 of 2. 
Goalies—Montreal, Price 3-0-0 (33 shots-31 saves). Pittsburgh, Fleury 0-3-0 (30-27). 
A—18,626 (18,387). T—2:23. 
Referees—Greg Kimmerly, Brad Watson. Linesmen—Derek Amell, Greg Devorski. Other stories of interest
